checks.name: distribution_logging_enabled
checks.title: Ensure that logging is enabled for every cloudfront distribution
checks.risk: Logging needs to be enabled to have visibility into access patterns, detect and investigate potential security threats, and comply with security best practices and regulatory requirements.

remediation.text: in addition to the CLI, you can also remediate via the management console

checks.internal_notes: the logging configuration only comes with get-distribution-config, not with list-distributions.

checks.name: distribution_waf_enabled
checks.title: Ensure that there is a Well Application Firewall associated with Cloudfront Distribution
checks.risk: WAF provide an additional layer of security and not having them associated can leave your distributions open to attacks from the internet such as DDoS

remediation.text: Associate your CloudFront Distributions with a Web ACL.

checks.internal_notes: Replace YOUR_WEB_ACL_ID and YOUR_DISTRIBUTION_ID with your actual values. Ensure that the WebACL allows the desired rules and conditions for your security requirements.
